avalancheActivity.highlights: Not much snow at low elevations but small slabs could be present at very high elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Not much snow at lower elevations. Snowfall and blowing snow was over the weekend so small wind slabs could be present at very high elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs are present and could become larger in the next few days, especially in the E and N parts.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs are present and could become larger in the next few days, especially in the E and N parts.

weatherForecast.highlights: NA/A-átt og úrkomulaust. Frost til fjalla.

avalancheActivity.comment: An avalanche released in Litlahryggsgil above Flateyri on Nov 30.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs have formed in the mountains. A small avalanche released in Litlahryggsgil on Sunday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Small wind slabs have formed and more slabs are expected to forom in the next few days in snowfall and drifting snow, especially on W-facing slopes. It has thawed at lower elevations and little snow is in the area in general but it will snow in the next few days.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs are present and could become larger in the next few days, especially in the E and N parts.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs are present and could become larger in the next few days, especially in the E and N parts.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hvassar A/NA-áttir næstu daga og snjókoma með köflum til fjalla en slydda við sjávarmál. Kólnar á fimmtudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small sluffs have been seen at high elevations.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs are likely present on all aspects. Light snow expected over the next days in Easterly winds.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Recent snowfall has occurred in northerly and southerly directions. On Monday and Tuesday, light snow is expected in Easterly wind directions. Wind slabs are expected to be found in all aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs are present and could become larger in the next few days, especially in the E and N parts.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs are present and could become larger in the next few days, especially in the E and N parts.

weatherForecast.highlights: Frá mánudegi til þriðjudags er útlit fyrir snjókomu til fjalla í austlægri átt. Á miðvikudag og fimmtudag er búist við rólegra veðri utan við stöku éljagang.

avalancheActivity.comment: A few small avalanches released in Norðfjörður on Saturday.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow is in the area and wind slabs, which are unstable at first.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow is in the area and wind slabs which are likely unstable at first. A few avalanches in Norðfjörður last weekend indicate that the new snow is localized not bonding well with the older snow. Ongoing NE/E winds with snow so more wind slab formation is expected, especially on SW/W aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Wind slabs are present and could become larger in the next few days, especially in the E and N parts.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Wind slabs are present and could become larger in the next few days, especially in the E and N parts.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hvöss NA-átt og snjókoma, slydda á láglendi. Kólnar á fimmtudag.
